markdown:
I see I missed another perfect candidate for my [Artisanal software blogpost](https://gerben.dev/posts/artisanal-software-for-humans): Meadow.cafe

[Meadow.cafe Tools](https://meadow.cafe/tools/) mention quite a few, from guestbooks, to tiny-blogging sites, RSS readers and link checkers.

I love the thought of "I made something for me, but you can use it too" and I'm also loving the minimal, yet classy, CSS on all the tools.
